title: I Need Chests And Keys
body:
Hello Riot..
I Was Flaming And I Got 14 Days Ban And Im Trying My Best To Improve My Behave..
Now The 14 Days Ban Ended In 5/5 And We Are In 26/5 Now And I Cant Get Any Chests Or Keys Till Now So Can I Get Them Soon And When I Will Get It ..
Sorry For My Bad English.
Thanks.

replies.body: After you've been [**restricted from hextech rewards**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209939463) you begin a reform period. Once you've shown consistent improvement, those restrictions will be lifted and you'll be able to get keys and chests again.
